00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_CONVERT_TRAITS_TWIN_VALUES_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_CONVERT_TRAITS_TWIN_VALUES_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/mpl/eval_if.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/mpl/identity.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/type_traits/add_reference.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/detail/convert_traits/add_const.hpp>
00016 
00017 namespace boost{
00018 namespace assign{ 
00019 namespace v2{
00020 namespace ref{
00021 namespace convert_traits{
00022 namespace twin_values{
00023 
00024     template<typename V, bool or_const, bool and_ref>
00025     struct reference
00026     {
00027         typedef typename convert_traits::add_const<V,or_const>::type c_;
00028         typedef typename boost::mpl::eval_if_c<
00029             and_ref,
00030             boost::add_reference<c_>,
00031             boost::mpl::identity<c_>
00032         >::type type;
00033     };
00034 
00035 }// twin_values 
00036 }// convert_traits
00037 }// ref
00038 }// v2
00039 }// assign
00040 }// boost
00041 
00042 #endif
